document.id: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04770
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE AMENDING CHAPTER 7.04 – PRIMA FACIE SPEED LIMITS OF THE SAN MATEO COUNTY ORDINANCE CODE REGARDING PRIMA FACIE SPEED LIMITS ON ALPINE ROAD: A) REPEALING THE PORTION OF SECTION 7.04.045 WHICH READS: “ALONG ALPINE ROAD BEGINNING AT A POINT APPROXIMATELY 0.38 MILES SOUTHERLY OF JUNIPERO SERRA BOULEVARD AND EXTENDING TO A POINT APPROXIMATELY 200 FEET NORTHERLY OF LA CUESTA DRIVE”; AND B) AMENDING SECTION 7.04.035 – SPEED LIMIT THIRTY-FIVE MILES PER HOUR – TO ADD THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE: “ALONG ALPINE ROAD BEGINNING APPROXIMATELY 200 FEET NORTHERLY OF LA CUESTA DRIVE, TO A POINT APPROXIMATELY 0.38 MILES SOUTHERLY OF JUNIPERO SERRA BOULEVARD.”

citations.citation: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04770
